song.title: Open Up Our Eyes
song.lyrics:
[V1] .G Greater is the One Who's in us .Em D Greater is the One Who calls our name . C He will never fail
[V2] .G Stronger is the One within us .Em D Stronger is the One Who fights for us . C G He will never fail, You will never fail
[C] . C G D For Your love endures forever . C G D Oh, Your love endures forever .C G Open up our eyes . D Em Surround us with Your light . C G D Your love endures forever --- [V3] .G Mighty is the One Who's for us .Em D Mighty is the One Who's strong to save . C G He will make a way, You will make a way
[B] .Em C G D Our God is fighting for us always .Em C G D Our God is fighting for us all .Em C G D Our God is fighting for us always .Em C G D We are not alone, we are not alone
song.presentation: V1 V2 C V3 C B C B
